name: Alien
description: You are not of this Earth. Perhaps you were born on another planet, created in a lab beyond the stars, or are the last survivor of an ancient galactic race.

advantages.name: Alien Resilience
advantages.description: Your alien physiology grants you natural resistance to physical harm. You have an innate Damage Resistance (DR) of 1 against all physical damage, which stacks with any other sources of DR. Additionally, you have advantage on saving throws against poisons.

advantages.name: Advanced Technology
advantages.description: Your knowledge and access to advanced alien technology provide you with unique tools and gadgets. Any powers that apply the removable item power modification have their power scores increased by +1.

disadvantages.name: Cultural Misunderstanding
disadvantages.description: You have a disadvantage on Insight checks when trying to understand human behavior and social cues. Additionally, actions or customs that are commonplace for your alien race may be seen as strange or alarming to humans.

disadvantages.name: Lost Connection
disadvantages.description: You no longer have access to the resources and support from your alien civilization. Any attempt to contact or seek assistance from your home world is uncertain at best.

name: Mystic: The Chosen
description: Chosen by destiny or a divine prophecy, you carry the weight of a greater purpose. Your powers are guided by fate itself.

advantages.name: Destiny is All
advantages.description: Your path has been foretold. You gain +1 Grit and a bonus feat: Diehard.

disadvantages.name: A Set Path
disadvantages.description: Your mystic source has expectations. Powers must be tied to an item or patron.

name: Mystic: Practitioners
description: You are a student of mystical forces, trained through study, experience, or tradition. You wield supernatural forces through practiced ritual and deep understanding.

advantages.name: Mystic Insight
advantages.description: You possess deep mystical understanding and esoteric knowledge.

disadvantages.name: Bound by Oath
disadvantages.description: You must act according to a mystical code or tradition.

name: Mystic: Enchanters
description: You specialize in crafting and manipulating magic-infused items. Enchanters blend arcane tradition with technical creativity.

advantages.name: Arcane Tinkering
advantages.description: You can enchant and modify magical items creatively.

disadvantages.name: Technomystic Feedback
disadvantages.description: Combining magic and tech causes instability. Roleplay and story consequence.

name: Super-Human
description: Whether through genetic enhancement, scientific experimentation, or sheer evolutionary luck, your physical abilities exceed human norms.

advantages.name: Power Infusion
advantages.description: Your powers are enhanced. Gain +1 Power Score and may select a power feat.

disadvantages.name: Power Limits
disadvantages.description: You are limited to powers that mimic your original infusion powers post-creation.

name: Demi-God
description: You are the child or chosen champion of a divine being. The blood of gods flows in your veins, granting you strength and purpose.

advantages.name: Divine Blood
advantages.description: You may select the Power Surge feat for free.

disadvantages.name: Divine Power Limits
disadvantages.description: Your powers must stem from divine objects (amulets, weapons, etc).

name: Supernatural
description: You are touched by forces beyond mortal comprehension—magic, gods, curses, or eldritch energies shape your being.
ability_bonuses: Choice of +1 to any two ability scores

advantages.name: More Than Human
advantages.description: You gain two bonus feats: Diehard and any non-Visionary feat.

disadvantages.name: Strange Appearance & Vulnerability
disadvantages.description: You must select a Strange Appearance Complication and a Thematic Vulnerability worth 10 pts.

name: Highly Trained
description: You are not superhuman—you’re just better. Peak human ability, years of training, and relentless will have honed you into a weapon.

advantages.name: Skill Mastery
advantages.description: You gain additional trained skills and access to advanced knowledge.

disadvantages.name: No Natural Powers
disadvantages.description: You cannot have powers unless they have the All-Skill modification.

details.power_limit: Cannot have powers without All-Skill modification

name: Tech Hero
description: Augmented with cutting-edge gear, you rely on advanced science and technology to empower your actions and defend the helpless.

advantages.name: Technological Edge
advantages.description: You may select the Technophile feat for free.

disadvantages.name: Powered by Gear
disadvantages.description: All of your powers must have the Removable Item modifier.

details.restriction: All powers must have Removable Item
